node_id.description: Node ID associated with the user

avatar_url.description: URL of the user's avatar image

gravatar_id.description: Unique identifier of the user's Gravatar image

url.description: URL of the user's GitHub API endpoint

html_url.description: URL of the user's GitHub profile

following_url.description: URL of the users that the user is following

starred_url.description: URL of the repositories starred by the user

subscriptions_url.description: URL of the repositories the user is subscribed to

organizations_url.description: URL of the organizations the user belongs to

events_url.description: URL of the events performed by the user

received_events_url.description: URL of the received events by the user

type.description: Type of user account (e.g., User or Organization)

site_admin.description: Boolean indicating if the user is a site administrator

organization.description: Name of the organization the user is a part of

team_slug.description: Slug identifier of the user's team
